level.heading: LRAP; rulemaking.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2 [§ 2-501 et seq.], shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-21
level.text: For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 4-1701.01.
